comment: * An input stream for decoding Base64 bytes

variables.name: wpos
variables.comment: writing bit pos inside bits; one of 24 (left, msb), 18, 12, 6, 0

variables.name: rpos
variables.comment: reading bit pos inside bits: one of 24 (left, msb), 16, 8, 0

methods.name: private int leftovers(byte[] b, int off, int pos, int limit)
private int eof(byte[] b, int off, int pos, int limit) throws IOException
private int padding(byte[] b, int off, int pos, int limit) throws IOException
public int read(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException
